name: PMP Gateway
description: Unified API gateway and authentication service. Provides single sign-on, request routing, and security for your entire platform.

name: PMP Deploy
description: Simple deployment orchestration tool. Deploy applications across multiple environments with built-in rollback and health checks.

name: PMP Monitor
description: Lightweight monitoring and alerting system. Track metrics, logs, and uptime with customizable dashboards and notifications.

name: PMP Docs
description: Documentation platform with markdown support. Create and host beautiful documentation sites for your projects and APIs.

name: PMP CI
description: Continuous Integration pipeline manager. Simple, fast, and self-hosted CI/CD for your development workflow.

name: PMP Store
description: Object storage service with S3-compatible API. Store and serve files, backups, and media assets efficiently.

name: PMP Notify
description: Unified notification service. Send notifications across email, SMS, Slack, and webhooks from a single API.

name: PMP Analytics
description: Privacy-focused analytics platform. Track user behavior and application metrics without compromising user privacy.

name: PMP Queue
description: Message queue and job processing system. Handle background jobs, scheduled tasks, and async workflows.
